short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open links without leaving the keyboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a fan of keyboard shortcuts? Do you ever find yourself annoyed that you have to move your hands to the mouse to click a link? Then this extension might be for you.

Press `/` or `?` to start listening. Type the first few characters matching the start of the link or button text. Youâ€™ll immediately focus on the first instance, if there is one. Follow up with `Tab` and `Shift-Tab` to jump around other instances; hit `Escape` to cancel and try a different search.
